CreateCloudNativeAPIGatewayRoute.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tse.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCloudNativeAPIGatewayRoute
<公共请求参数>

{
    "GatewayId": "gateway-9abf3b79",
    "ServiceID": "service-demo",
    "RouteName": "route-demo",
    "Methods": [
        "GET",
        "POST"
    ],
    "Hosts": [
        "www.baidu.com"
    ],
    "Paths": [
        "/"
    ],
    "PreserveHost": true,
    "StripPath": false,
    "HttpsRedirectStatusCode": 308
}
